#labels Deprecated

Augmentation is construction of additional triples based on existing graph.

{{{

Augment fromTriple {
  case Triple( s, `height`, TypedLiteral( hInCm, XSD.int ) ) => 
    List( Triple( s, meters, TypedLitral( hInCm/100, XSD.decimal ) ) )
}

Augment fromBag( _/-/name ) {
  case n =>
    List( Triple( n, fullName, n/givenName/asString + " " + n/familyName/asString ) )
}

}}}
